Insight Global is a national staffing and services company that specializes in sourcing information technology, accounting, finance, and engineering professionals and delivering service-based solutions to Fortune 1000 clients. Insight Global completes more than 33,000 placements annually in short-term, long-term, contract-to-hire, and direct placement positions through our network of more than 40 regional offices across the U.S. and Canada. The company has been ranked one of the fastest growing staffing firms for 10 consecutive years and named the 3rd largest IT staffing firm in America by Staffing Industry Analysts. We offer unmatched customer service by developing an in-depth understanding of client needs, providing qualified professionals, and tailoring managed services solutions for large projects, which allows clients to focus on expanding their business and achieving their goals.2016 “Best of Staffing Client & Talent Award” – Inavero Staffing Industry Analysts- 2015 - 3rd Largest IT Staffing Firm & 14th Largest Staffing Firm2014 - 4th Largest IT Staffing Firm & 19th Largest Staffing Firm2013 - 6th Largest IT Staffing Firm & 19th Largest Staffing Firm2012 - 8th Largest IT Staffing Firm & 20th Largest Staffing Firm2011 - #5 Fastest Growing & 9th Largest IT Staffing Firm 2010 - #2 Fastest Growing & 9th Largest IT Staffing Firm2009 - #4 Fastest Growing & 14th Largest IT Staffing Firm2008 - #4 Fastest Growing IT Staffing Firm2007 - #1 Fastest Growing IT Staffing Firm2006 - #1 Fastest Growing IT Staffing Firm

Insight Global is a premier staffing services firm with 38 locations in the US and Canada. Insight Global provides contract staffing for IT and Accounting, Finance, and Engineering through its AF&E division. The company has been ranked one of the fastest growing staffing firms for the past 9 consecutive years and named the 4th largest IT staffing firm in America by The Staffing Industry Analysts. Insight Global will continue this growth by continually expanding office locations and new markets. Insight Global employs over 26,000 people in companies each year with revenues over $1 Billion.  Insight Global strives for the fastest response times to inbound job requisitions, and we focus on building relationships with both clients and consultants. Our candidates are the cornerstone of our business. Our goal is to present you with a perfect employment opportunity for your skillset while exhibiting our core values of honesty, integrity and a commitment to ethical business practices. Our highly trained Recruiters will take the time to evaluate both your credentials and career aspirations to identify the right job for you. This formula leads to both client and consultant satisfaction and industry-leading placement times. #4 “America’s best companies to work for” - Yahoo Finance Staffing Industry Analysts-  2014 - 4th Largest IT Staffing Firm & 19th Largest Staffing Firm 2013 - 6th Largest IT Staffing Firm & 19th Largest Staffing Firm 2012 - 8th Largest IT Staffing Firm & 20th Largest Staffing Firm 2011 - #5 Fastest Growing & 9th Largest IT Staffing Firm  2010 - #2 Fastest Growing & 9th Largest IT Staffing Firm 2009 - #4 Fastest Growing & 14th Largest IT Staffing Firm 2008 - #4 Fastest Growing IT Staffing Firm 2007 - #1 Fastest Growing IT Staffing Firm 2006 - #1 Fastest Growing IT Staffing Firm Inc. 500- 2011 - “One of America’s Top 10 Job Producers”

Being my first job, Barefoot Beach Tanning allowed me to gain the experience of providing a high level of customer service, marketing, and sales proficiency. My experience furthers into assisting customer needs and salon operations to optimize profits. As an employee, a way to increase profits is by promoting lotion and spray tan sales. The responsibilities that I maintain include cleanliness of the salon, training new employees, and not only helping, but also informing customers of the procedures. I have gained a broad spectrum in the marketing and sales field throughout my hard work and dedication for Barefoot Beach Tanning.

As a model at Entourage Clothing & Gifts, I not only promote the products and merchandise through online advertising, but also through prints that are distributed throughout the six stores. Along with modeling, I demonstrated a high proficiency in working efficiently with stylists and photographers. Through this position, I have shown my devotion, punctuality, and love for advertising.

My job as an intern was to communicate with the students and staff of Southern Polytechnic State University via social media outlets. I communicated by creating interactive tweets and Facebook posts as a fictional student, as well as promoting material to engage the interests among the university. Along with creating posts on social media outlets, I designed flyers to go along with the promotional events happening seasonally on campus. While interning I utilized Microsoft Office programs and exceeded in my communication skills both in person and digitally through online platforms.
